thread.title: Man United fan slams Jose Mourinho - "we're the same as we were under Louis van Gaal but the results are WORSE!"
thread.title_full: Man United fan slams Jose Mourinho - "we're the same as we were under Louis van Gaal but the results are WORSE!"

author: Jake Polden
title: Man United fan slams Jose Mourinho - "we're the same as we were under Louis van Gaal but the results are WORSE!"
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Things aren't exactly terrible for Manchester United at the moment. 
But we suppose if you've grown up in the Fergie era, anything other than competing for the title and dominating teams at Old Trafford is considered failure. 
This goes some way to explaining the anger of this Red Devils fan, who called BBC Radio 5 Live to launch, quite possibly, the rant to end all rants. 
In the above video, the man named John hits out at the Portuguese boss, stating that under his leadership the results are no better than they were under previous manager Louis van Gaal. But, I'm the special one! (Photo: Julian Finney) 
"The football is slightly better, but the results are worse, we've had nine draws, five at home this season. We got beat off City! 
"Top four is gone, we won't be in the Champions League for the next 10 years!" 
The enraged supporter goes on to explain why he thinks his side have no chance of turning their season around, despite being just four points off the top four. 
"We have one pace, and it's garbage! The fan compares Jose Mourinho to Louis van Gaal (Photo: Getty) Man United drew 0-0 with Hull City last time out (Photo: REUTERS) 
"We can't finish teams off. Rashford and Martial are the only players in our team who have any pace what so ever! Ibra's got no pace, Rooney's got no pace! We're garbage!". 
This time last year United were fifth in the Premier League - one place above were they currently are this season, but on 37 points. 
They are five points better off at this point in the current season, and have won one more game. poll loading Will Jose Mourinho win a Premier League title at Manchester United? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
